function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of trust in government relief funds for COVID-19","Impact":"Mismanagement of relief funds, leading to ineffective support during the crisis","Mitigation":"Implement transparent and decentralized systems for fund distribution","Technologies":"Blockchain, DLT","People":"Citizens relying on relief funds","Owner":"Government, technology experts"},{"Description":"Underutilization of Blockchain and DLT for relief fund distribution","Impact":"Inefficient distribution of relief funds, leading to delays and lack of accountability","Mitigation":"Research and implement innovative applications of Blockchain and DLT for fund transfer","Technologies":"Blockchain, DLT","People":"Government, relief fund recipients","Owner":"Technology experts, government agencies"},{"Description":"Lack of exploration of cloud computing for COVID-19 response","Impact":"Missed opportunities for leveraging cloud computing in crisis management and data sharing","Mitigation":"Identify and implement cloud computing solutions for better crisis response and data management","Technologies":"Cloud computing","People":"Public health agencies, crisis management organizations","Owner":"Technology experts, public health agencies"}]}
